about.title: About Us
about.description3: we build fast, secure, and bilingual (EN/ES) web experiences in Miami, FL. We combine Next.js, Tailwind, Express, PostgreSQL, and Shopify to launch quickly and grow sustainably. From simple websites to robust online stores and custom backends, we focus on performance, SEO, and maintainability.
